mapper.select: select id, name, email_id || '@' || email_domain as email , tel1 || '-' || tel2 || '-' || tel3 as tel , post, basic_addr || detail_addr as addr, type, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date from tbl_member order by reg_date desc

insert into tbl_member(id, name, password, email_id, email_domain, tel1, tel2, tel3, post, basic_addr, detail_addr) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{emailId}, #{emailDo}, #{telA}, #{telB}, #{telC}, #{post}, #{basicAddr}, #{detailAddr})
